author: lehors
msg: XMLScanner now implements Component and takes care of the
properties common to XMLDocumentScanner and XMLDTDScanner.

author: andyc
msg: Updated more things to use the Constants class. Less redundant
strings means less chance of errors due to typos. Plus, we can
change the actual strings later if needed and just need to
recompile the source -- no hunting down all of the uses of
